purpose: The email is a notification about a job opening for a Senior Lecturer in Computer Science with a specialization in AI Engineering at Karlstad University, Sweden. It invites colleagues to consider applying for the position within the Software Quality and Digital Modernization (SQuaD) group. The email provides details about the application process, qualifications required, and the responsibilities associated with the role. It emphasizes the importance of collaboration in research and teaching within the department and encourages potential candidates to submit their applications by the specified deadline.

evidence_sentences: Considering applying to join the Software Quality and Digital Modernization (SQuaD) at the Department of Mathematics and Computer Science, Karlstad University (Sweden).
The Department of Mathematics and Computer Science hereby invites applications for a senior lectureship in Computer Science with a specialisation in AI Engineering.

The senior lecturer in AI Engineering will be an important person for further extending the expertise in the research group on Software Quality and Digital Modernization (SQuaD) and the overall department.
You are expected to conduct innovative research in AI Engineering contributing to SQuaD as well as to the overall department in collaboration with its other research groups.
Submit the application via the Universityâ€™s web-based recruitment tool, Varbi.
